priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Observational Study Biospecimen Retention Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C127258

self.title: CDISC SDTM Observational Study Biospecimen Retention Terminology

definition: The terminology relevant to whether biospecimens were retained and contain DNA within an observational study.
name: Observational Study Biospecimen Retention
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Observational Study Biospecimen Retention Terminology

terms.definition: An indication that no biospecimen samples were retained.
An indication that the retained biospecimens contain DNA.
An indication that the retained biospecimens do not contain DNA.
terms.preferredTerm: Retained Specimens Do Not Contain DNA
